mutants.original_line: return ''.join(shift_letter(letter, -shift) if letter.isalpha() else letter for letter in string)
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((shift_letter(letter, -shift) if letter.isalpha() else letter for letter in string))

mutants.original_line: ascii_offset = ord('a') if letter.islower() else ord('A')
mutants.mutated_line: ascii_offset = ord('') if letter.islower() else ord('A')

mutants.original_line: ascii_offset = ord('a') if letter.islower() else ord('A')
mutants.mutated_line: ascii_offset = ord('a') if letter.islower() else ord('')

mutants.original_line: return ''.join(shift_letter(letter, -shift) if letter.isalpha() else letter for letter in string)
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((shift_letter(letter, +shift) if letter.isalpha() else letter for letter in string))
